statements: DELETE FROM high_value_customers WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND loyalty_points > 500;
DELETE FROM high_value_customers WHERE total_spent < 1000 OR loyalty_points = 0;

DELETE FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale Campaign';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
